name: SweeTARTS Ropes, Candy, Twisted Rainbow Punch, Soft and Chewy, 9 oz
short_description: A TWIST ON THE CLASSIC: A classic fruit punch flavor fusion in a 9 oz pack — a rope candy with a tart filling, creating a mouthwatering treat that leaves your taste buds wanting more
FLAVOR EXPLOSION: The colorful candy that provides a tasty sweet and tart combination — a chewy explosion of flavor that provides the best of both worlds
SWEETARTS SOFT & CHEWY ROPES: We take the classic SweeTARTS flavors further with these fun ropes. Each sweet candy rope contains a tart fruit punch flavor
PERFECT FOR SNACKING: SweeTARTS candy offers a delicious assortment of sweet & tart flavors. Enjoy this tangy sensation all to yourself, whenever you need a little treat
TRY THEM ALL: More SweeTARTS products means more to love! Try some of our other delicious, tangy candy including Gummies Fruity Splitz, Ropes Bites, Mini Chewy, and more
SWEET AND TART: The candy that provides an explosion of flavor with the best of both worlds. SweeTARTS is a fan-favorite brand that's perfect as party candy or a day-to-day colorful treat
product_description: Sweet and tart – SweeTARTS Ropes are delightfully sweet and boldly tart. This bag contains one 9-ounce pack of SweeTARTS Twisted Rainbow Punch Ropes. Each soft rope is a bendable fusion of fun. They’re chewy, with a tart fruit punch flavor. This ideal snack time pack includes the perfect amount to share with family and friends. The dynamic combination, releasing a sweet and tantalizingly tangy sensation for your taste buds: SweeTARTS Ropes. SweeTARTS Ropes are part of the SweeTARTS family! Try some of our other delicious, tangy candy including Ropes Bites, Mini Chewy, and more. Since 1962, SweeTARTS has grown into an iconic candy brand known for its unexpected, delicious sweet & tart flavor combination. It’s perfect as party candy or a day-to-day colorful treat. Packaging may vary.

product_description: There's no party like a TWIZZLERS candy party! Seriously though, TWIZZLERS chewy candies are too fun not to enjoy with family and friends at every movie marathon, birthday party and tailgate. With a bulk party pack of TWIZZLERS assorted flavored chewy candies ready for action, you'll never find yourself without a delicious shareable snack. This party pack includes TWIZZLERS Twists strawberry flavored chewy candy, TWIZZLERS PULL 'N' PEEL cherry flavored chewy candy, TWIZZLERS Twists rainbow flavored chewy candy and TWIZZLERS PULL 'N' PEEL watermelon flavored chewy candy. Whether you're in the mood for a classic TWIZZLERS treat or want to try a new vibrant flavor, you'll be set with this assortment party pack. Keep your pantry stocked with kosher certified, licorice style TWIZZLERS chewy candies, store some in your work desk or take a bag on a road trip or to your next party gathering. Looking for an even greater adventure? For a unique twist, melt several white creme or milk chocolate bars, dip your TWIZZLERS candies in the melted gooeyness, then cover each piece in sprinkles and let the new treats cool! They even make scrumptious holiday treats for Christmas stocking stuffers, Halloween trick-or-treat bags, Easter baskets and Valentine's Day presents.

name: Bulk Strawberry Twist Licorice Candy - 1 Pound Bag Fun Size Individually Wrapped Soft & Chewy Candy For Parties, Pinata Fillers, Snacks & Treats - Approx 45 Pieces
short_description: Fun Size, Individually Wrapped - Each piece is individually wrapped for easy sharing, making it the ideal size for parties, school lunches, piñatas, or on-the-go snacks.
Delicious Strawberry Flavor - Enjoy the perfect mix of sweet and tangy in every bite. These strawberry twist licorice pieces are soft, chewy, and packed with flavor that everyone will love.
1 Pound Bag with About 45 Pieces - Each 1-pound bag contains approximately 45 fun-sized pieces, giving you plenty of candy to share at a party or keep stocked up for your own snack cravings.

Great for Parties, Piñatas, and More - These strawberry twists are perfect for filling candy bowls, piñatas, or party favor bags. They’re also great for birthday parties, school events, and holiday celebrations—kids and adults alike will enjoy them.

Soft, Chewy Texture - The soft and chewy texture of each twist makes them a treat that’s hard to resist. Whether you're enjoying them yourself or sharing with friends, they offer a satisfying snack that everyone will love.
product_description: Treat yourself to the sweet, chewy goodness of Strawberry Twist Licorice Candy. Each piece is packed with a mouthwatering strawberry flavor that’s both sweet and slightly tangy, giving you a perfect balance of fruity delight. The soft, chewy texture makes these licorice twists irresistible, and with approximately 45 fun-sized, individually wrapped pieces per 1-pound bag, there's plenty to go around. Whether you're filling a candy bowl for a party, adding to a piñata, or just stocking up for a sweet snack on-the-go, these individually wrapped pieces are perfect for any occasion. The small, fun-sized portions allow for easy sharing and portion control, making them great for both kids and adults. These strawberry licorice twists are made with high-quality ingredients to ensure every piece stays fresh and flavorful. They're an excellent choice for birthday parties, holidays, school events, or just satisfying your cravings for something sweet. Plus, with no mess and no sticky fingers, these licorice twists are as convenient as they are delicious. Enjoy the perfect treat whenever you need a quick pick-me-up or add them to your next celebration for a fun and flavorful candy everyone can enjoy.

name: Red Vines Black Licorice Candy Black Licorice Soft Chewy Candy Twists 3.5 Lb Jar
short_description: Pair this deliciously rewarding black licorice with other pantry snacks like salty popcorn or trail mix
Celebrate sweet moments with a Red Vines black licorice chew, a nostalgic candy loved for generations
The iconic Red Vines candy jar is also available filled with Original Red flavor licorice sweets
Share these soft & chewy candy twists at the office, a party, a BBQ, or at home with family & friends
All Red Vines candies are fat free and Kosher certified, so satisfy your sugar cravings with a smile!
product_description: Family-owned and operated since 1914, the American LicoriceCompany is proud to use artisanal candy-making techniques that have been passed down through five generations. Made using small batch process, Red Vines candy holds a prime spot in the hearts of candy loving kids and adults alike. American Licorice Company is committed to improving our manufacturing processes to reduce environmental impact by tracking greenhouse gas emissions from our two U.S facilities. We purchase carbon offsets for greenhouse gas emissions as well as invest in Green-e Energy Certified Renewable Energy Certificates that are sourced from wind energy facilities in the lower 48 states. We also support our local communities by investing in a brighter future. American Licorice Company employees contributed over 2,000 hours of volunteer service last year and donated more than 20,000 backpacks full of school supplies over the last six years through our partnership with the Kids in Need Foundation. Whether you seek out nostalgic candy or a treat offering one of the latest flavor trends, there’s something for everyone. If you love classics, there’s Original Red, grape flavored, or our traditional Black Licorice twists. You can also bulk up your pantry with a variety of twists, bars, bites, whips, superstrings, or Twistettes. Try Red Vines candy in a resealable pack for snacks on-the-go.

short_description: Deliciously Chewy & Flavorful – Enjoy a perfectly soft and chewy texture with a burst of rich licorice flavor in every bite. A classic treat for licorice lovers of all ages!
Authentic & Premium Ingredients – Made with high-quality ingredients, ensuring an authentic taste with every piece.

Perfect for Snacking & Sharing – Whether you're craving a sweet treat for yourself or looking for a fun snack to share at parties, movie nights, or gift baskets, our licorice candy is the perfect choice!
Fresh & Flavorful in Every Bite – Packaged to maintain freshness, ensuring you get the perfect chewy texture and bold licorice taste from the first bite to the last.
Ideal Gift for Licorice Lovers – A must-have for any licorice fan! Great as a stocking stuffer, holiday treat, or special surprise for birthdays and celebrations.
product_description: Indulge in the rich, chewy goodness of Backroad Country Old Fashioned Licorice, a nostalgic treat crafted for true licorice lovers. Made in the USA with high-quality ingredients, this classic candy delivers a perfectly soft and chewy texture with every bite. Whether you love the bold, traditional taste of black licorice or prefer sweet and fruity varieties, we offer a flavor for everyone to enjoy. Our licorice is a throwback to the timeless confections of the past, made with care to ensure superior taste and freshness. It's perfect for snacking at home, enjoying on the go, or sharing with friends and family. Whether you're adding it to a gift basket, using it as a party favor, or simply treating yourself, Backroad Country Old Fashioned Licorice is a must-have for any licorice lover. Order now and experience the timeless taste of this classic American favorite!
